item.title: SELinux Debugging on ChromeOS
item.description: Not being an SELinux expert but having to deal with it from time-to-time, I find it may be productive to write some debugging notes. So this post is about an issue that I fixed just this morning. Issue: Runtime labeled pseudo-files are not getting labelled On ChromeOS, there are Android-specific policies which are combined with the ChromeOS ones. For someone who tries to stay away from SELinux, this is pretty much voodoo.
